name: INSendRideFeedbackIntent
desc: An intent indicating that the user provided feedback for a completed ride.

items.name: init(rideIdentifier: String)
items.desc: Initializes the intent object with the specified ride identifier.

items.name: var rideIdentifier: String
items.desc: The unique identifier that you assigned to the ride.

items.name: var rating: NSNumber?
items.desc: The user-supplied rating for the driver.
